name: Satanic Panic (bitterkarella)
description:
It's 1995 and seemingly rational adults all over the country are suddenly convinced that heavy metal rock music, horror movies, roleplaying games are seducing kids into devil worship and witchcraft! When self-declared Satanic Ritual expert Mike Warke comes to Manitou, Wisconsin and convinces the town blue noses to burn all satanic material, it's up to heavy metal rocker Velvet, roleplaying gamer Norman, and horror film buff Jimmy to save the town from the grip of Satanic panic!

Satanic Panic is a point-and-click adventure game made in RPGmaker.
